string.value: An urgent message was sent from #b#p9000021##k.
An urgent message was sent from Agent #b#p9000021##k.

#bGaga#k asked you to become an agent out of nowhere...and you agreed! Now what? Hmm, come ot think of it, the #bMaple Admin#k and #bCassandra#k both looked suspicious with their black sunglasses. Time to interrogate #bGaga#k for more details.
Agent #b#h0##k! Come in, over. \r\n#L0##bSay what? Agent G? You're Gaga, the caretaker of maple tree.#l

That's in the past. From today, I am #bSecret Agent Gaga#k. Currently, there are agents all over Maple World trying to find one of Maple's Most Wanted, #e#r'Master M'#k#n. Now that I'm an agent, I know it's what I was meant to be.\r\n#L0#Who is #e#rMaster M#k?#n#l

#e#rMaster M#k#n is not only deadly, but mysterious. We have no idea if it's a man or a woman, adult or a child. We just know it can appear and vanish instantaneously, which makes it #ra threat to Maple World#k! Scary! #b#h0##kMaple World needs you! Want to join in?

Congratulations! You are now an agent as well. I've given you some equipment. #bIf you become qualified, you can keep those items forever.#k 
#i1072366# #t1072366#

If you want to accept a mission, come see me. In case of wiretaps, let's end this conversation. Agent Gaga, out!
You're not agent material yet. Come see me again when you're ready.
I knew you would accept my request.

Now put on the #b#t1072366##k I gave you. From now on, you will be helping our special agents complete their missions. Once you earn the respect of all the agents and get #bAgent N's Receiver, Agent C's Titanium Receiver, Ultimate Agent Suit, Agent O's Leather Gloves, and the Agent Cape#k, I will give you the #bUltimate Agent Shoes#k as a gift.
